Hi, I'm just new to here and hope not bothering you by this reply.

>    I have been searching the web and there is only one other place I 
> can find that says Goro Nyudo Koumitsushi was the great Masamune. 

"KOUMITSU-SHI" means "Son of Yukimitsu".
(Masamune's father was Tohzaburou-Yukimitsu).
Yukimitsu is another  pronunciation for charactors "KOUMITSU".

http://www.jttk.zaq.ne.jp/nihontou/rekishi/kamakura3.htm
Could this page be some help for you?
(Written in Japanese)

M.Nakazaki
